snippet: The relationship between Graeme McDowell and Rory McIlroy has changed off the course and in the Ryder Cup....

headline.print_headline: McDowell Says Foursomes the Best Fit With McIlroy
headline.main: McDowell Says Foursomes the Best Fit With McIlroy

lead_paragraph: The relationship between Graeme McDowell and Rory McIlroy has changed off the course and in the Ryder Cup.
